# GKMatchType.turnBased

**Case**

A turn-based match hosted by Game Center.

## Declaration

```swift
case turnBased
```

## Discussion

A [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKTurnBasedMatch] object represents a turn-based match.

## Types

- **GKMatchType.peerToPeer**: A peer-to-peer match hosted by Game Center.
- **GKMatchType.hosted**: A match hosted on your private server.
